Context: can you tell me what the shirt is made of. how many colors does it come in. hello, our shirts are most commonly made from pure cotton, with a 90% cotton and 10% linen blend. to be sure, you can check the label on the collar to indicate what material it is made out of. thank  you. how wide is the collar of the shirt? what are the different sizes that the shirts comes in. hello, the standard collar is 15 inches. we also have a smaller collar at 14 inches and large one that is 16 inches. does it have any different logos or styles. our shirts come in a variety of sizes. if your desired size is listed as empty online, that means we are currently out of stock. we will refill our stock the second week of each month, i suggest checking back then. what are the different colors that it comes in.
